games.summary: PHILADELPHIA -- —Tyrese Maxeyscored 20 of his 35 points in the third quarter,Andre Drummondhad 12 points and 10 rebounds, and thePhiladelphia 76ersbeat theWashington Wizards121-102 on Tuesday night. Philadelphia had its 66-54 halftime lead trimmed to five after Washington scored the first seven points of the third quarter.
blurbs: ⬆️ Jabari Walker (PHI) played 24 min (season avg: 13). 10 pts, 12 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: TORONTO -- —Scottie Barnesscored 28 points to help theToronto Raptorsedge thePortland Trail Blazers121-118 on Tuesday night. Immanuel Quickleyhad 23 points with eight assists for Toronto, which had lost two in a row.Brandon Ingramscored 21 points, and reserveGradey Dickfinished with 14.
blurbs: 📋 Ja'Kobe Walter (TOR) made just his 4th start this season. 3 pts, 2 reb.
